7// DisplayGL.h: GL implementation of egl::Display
8
9#include "libANGLE/renderer/gl/DisplayGL.h"
10
11#include "libANGLE/AttributeMap.h"
12#include "libANGLE/Context.h"
13#include "libANGLE/Display.h"
14#include "libANGLE/Surface.h"
15#include "libANGLE/renderer/gl/ContextGL.h"
16#include "libANGLE/renderer/gl/RendererGL.h"
17#include "libANGLE/renderer/gl/StateManagerGL.h"
18#include "libANGLE/renderer/gl/SurfaceGL.h"
19
20#include <EGL/eglext.h>
21
22namespace rx
23{
24
25DisplayGL::DisplayGL(const egl::DisplayState &state) : DisplayImpl(state) {}
26
27DisplayGL::~DisplayGL() {}
28
29egl::Error DisplayGL::initialize(egl::Display *display)
30{
31 return egl::NoError();
32}
33
34void DisplayGL::terminate() {}
35
36ImageImpl *DisplayGL::createImage(const egl::ImageState &state,
37 const gl::Context *context,
38 EGLenum target,
39 const egl::AttributeMap &attribs)
40{
41 UNIMPLEMENTED();
42 return nullptr;
43}
44
45StreamProducerImpl *DisplayGL::createStreamProducerD3DTexture(
46 egl::Stream::ConsumerType consumerType,
47 const egl::AttributeMap &attribs)
48{
49 UNIMPLEMENTED();
50 return nullptr;
51}
52
53ShareGroupImpl *DisplayGL::createShareGroup()
54{
55 return new ShareGroupGL();
56}
57
58egl::Error DisplayGL::makeCurrent(egl::Display *display,
59 egl::Surface *drawSurface,
60 egl::Surface *readSurface,
61 gl::Context *context)
62{
63 // Ensure that the correct global DebugAnnotator is installed when the end2end tests change
64 // the ANGLE back-end (done frequently).
65 display->setGlobalDebugAnnotator();
66
67 if (!context)
68 {
69 return egl::NoError();
70 }
71
72 // Pause transform feedback before making a new surface current, to workaround anglebug.com/1426
73 ContextGL *glContext = GetImplAs<ContextGL>(context);
74 glContext->getStateManager()->pauseTransformFeedback();
75
76 if (drawSurface == nullptr)
77 {
78 ANGLE_TRY(makeCurrentSurfaceless(context));
79 }
80
81 return egl::NoError();
82}
83
84gl::Version DisplayGL::getMaxConformantESVersion() const
85{
86 // 3.1 support is in progress.
87 return std::min(getMaxSupportedESVersion(), gl::Version(3, 0));
88}
89
90void DisplayGL::generateExtensions(egl::DisplayExtensions *outExtensions) const
91{
92 // Advertise robust resource initialization on all OpenGL backends for testing even though it is
93 // not fully implemented.
94 outExtensions->robustResourceInitialization = true;
95}
96
97egl::Error DisplayGL::makeCurrentSurfaceless(gl::Context *context)
98{
99 UNIMPLEMENTED();
100 return egl::NoError();
101}
102} // namespace rx
